item.description:
@Pur3_pk3r_1 wrote:

I got these 2 errors when I was using this tut, http://www.fr33sc4p3.com/smf/index.php/topic,38.0.html

[code]NPCHandler.java:231: expected
public void goblin<int npc,int 101> {

                                               ^

NPCHandler.java:675: ‘>’ expected
public static boolean IsDropping = false;

2 errors[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: 11-06-2007, 19:45:00[/size][hr]Can anyone please help?
